rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
普通感冒冠状病毒可能提供对 COVID-19 的预先存在的免疫力罗格斯大学研究科学家的一项新研究表明，接触引起普通感冒的冠状病毒可能有助于预先存在的对 COVID-19 的免疫力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Common-cold-coronaviruses-may-offer-pre-existing-immunity-to-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Common-cold-coronaviruses-may-offer-pre-existing-immunity-to-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f787236-c092-42cc-a75b-c8edf9a099fe Fri, 18 Aug 2023 16:15:00 -0400 Common cold coronaviruses may offer pre-existing immunity to COVID-19
I 期试验显示干细胞治疗对严重角膜损伤患者的积极效果由来自麻省总医院布里格姆分校的 Mass Eye and Ear 的研究人员领导的团队报告了一种革命性干细胞疗法的 I 期试验结果，这种疗法被称为培养自体角膜缘上皮细胞移植 (CALEC)，该疗法被发现是安全且有效的。四名一只眼睛遭受严重化学烧伤的患者短期内耐受性良好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Phase-I-trial-shows-positive-results-for-stem-cell-treatment-in-病人-with-major-cornea-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Phase-I-trial-shows-positive-results-for-stem-cell-treatment-in-病人-with-major-cornea-injuries.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6ca3e1e-df75-467a-93fa-c52567ce5fd0 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 16:07:00 -0400 Phase I trial shows positive results for stem cell treatment in patients with major cornea injuries
疫情期间的远程课程交付为残疾医学生创造了最佳的学习环境一项研究显示，在 COVID-19 大流行期间，向学校报告残疾的医学生数量增加了 25% 以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Remote-curriculum-delivery-during-the-pandemic-creates-optimal-learning-environment-for-medical-students-with-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Remote-curriculum-delivery-during-the-pandemic-creates-optimal-learning-environment-for-medical-students-with-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a115860-b508-4a98-bb6e-3800c85ddc2a Fri, 18 Aug 2023 15:53:00 -0400 Remote curriculum delivery during the pandemic creates optimal learning environment for medical students with disabilities
疫苗接种可降低实体器官移植受者患重症 COVID-19 的风险约翰霍普金斯大学移植研究中心 (TRC) 与纽约大学外科和应用移植研究中心合作对近 2,400 名实体器官移植受者进行了为期两年的研究，结果表明，接种疫苗后 SARS-CoV 出现峰值-2 病毒感染（通常称为 COVID-19 突破性病例）仍然很常见，但在第一波病毒 omicron 亚变体出现后，住院率急剧下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Vaccination-reduces-risk-of-severe-COVID-19-in-solid-organ-transplant-recipients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Vaccination-reduces-risk-of-severe-COVID-19-in-solid-organ-transplant-recipients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edde4cef-2cdb-4e19-9a67-0733d159fdde Fri, 18 Aug 2023 15:31:00 -0400 Vaccination reduces risk of severe COVID-19 in solid organ transplant recipients
研究显示电子烟的使用会促使人们戒烟根据 MUSC 霍林斯癌症中心研究人员团队刚刚发布的一项新研究，电子烟确实具有作为戒烟辅助手段的价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/E-香烟-usage-nudges-people-toward-quitting-smoking-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/E-香烟-usage-nudges-people-toward-quitting-smoking-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdf517d1-9402-4077-8726-4220c5f76200 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 15:22:00 -0400 E-cigarette usage nudges people toward quitting smoking, study shows
研究发现，有益的肠道细菌利用粘液内层来保持原位当谈到肠道健康时，不仅重要的是谁被邀请参加聚会，而且他们的行为方式也很重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Beneficial-gut-bacteria-use-mucus-lined-to-stay-in-place-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Beneficial-gut-bacteria-use-mucus-lined-to-stay-in-place-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efd9f2ad-8fb6-4220-968b-feebdc1893d9 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 15:14:00 -0400 Beneficial gut bacteria use mucus lining to stay in place, study finds
严重的 COVID-19 可能会导致先天免疫系统发生长期变化美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家过敏和传染病研究所资助的一项小型研究表明，严重的 COVID-19 可能会导致先天免疫系统发生长期改变，而先天免疫系统是抵御病原体的第一道防线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Severe-COVID-19-may-cause-long-term-changes-to-innate-immune-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Severe-COVID-19-may-cause-long-term-changes-to-innate-immune-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46c7428a-3f00-4233-83f9-ed190765080b Fri, 18 Aug 2023 14:44:00 -0400 Severe COVID-19 may cause long-term changes to innate immune system
RARα 受体在 T 细胞激活中发挥意想不到的作用根据《免疫》杂志的新研究，T 细胞有一个核受体，它可以做一些非常奇怪但非常重要的事情，帮助它们对抗病原体并摧毁癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/RARceb1-receptor-plays-unexpected-role-in-T-cell-activation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/RARceb1-receptor-plays-unexpected-role-in-T-cell-activation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=781a6634-2ed9-4841-b8c3-d817455d509a Fri, 18 Aug 2023 14:32:00 -0400 RARα receptor plays unexpected role in T cell activation
杜兰大学、Ochsner Health 和 RH Impact 拨款 1,650 万美元，以解决路易斯安那州孕产妇死亡率高的问题杜兰大学、Ochsner Health 和社区非营利组织 RH Impact 获得美国国立卫生研究院提供的为期七年、价值 1650 万美元的拨款，用于建立一个卓越研究中心，专注于寻找解决路易斯安那州过高孕产妇死亡率的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Tulane-Ochsner-Health-and-RH-Impact-awarded-24165-million-grant-to-address-Louisianas-high-maternal-mortality-rate。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Tulane-Ochsner-Health-and-RH-Impact-awarded-24165-million-grant-to-address-Louisianas-high-maternal-mortality-rate。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b45d0ab-f2ca-4d06-b9b5-b1bc37ff03cf Fri, 18 Aug 2023 13:47:00 -0400 Tulane, Ochsner Health and RH Impact awarded $16.5 million grant to address Louisiana's high maternal mortality rate
荟萃分析报告全球成人 MAFLD 患病率为 38.8%非酒精性脂肪肝 (NAFLD) 是一种常见疾病，影响普通人群中高达 30% 的成年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Meta-analysis-reports-global-prevalence-of-MAFLD-of-38825-in-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Meta-analysis-reports-global-prevalence-of-MAFLD-of-38825-in-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e96a491-6dc6-4298-b826-7d026a4a7b23 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 12:06:00 -0400 Meta-analysis reports global prevalence of MAFLD of 38.8% in adults
